alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lawrence; Washington (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 3:03PM EDT until April 18 at 5:25AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River at Seymour. .Rainfall amounts of one to two inches across much of central Indiana yesterday has created lowland and minor flooding along the East Fork White at Seymour. The river should crest Saturday evening and fall back below flood Sunday evening. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River at Seymour. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.5 feet, Lowland flood continues. County Road 700 E begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 12.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:45 PM EDT Thursday was 12.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 13.1 feet just after midnight tonight and to 13.4 feet Saturday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
